names.english: augment the kidneys and warm the palace decoction
names.commonEnglish: Augment the Kidneys and Warm the Palace Decoction

actions: Tonifies the Middle Jiao, augments Qi, nourishes the Blood and promotes the generation of Body Fluids.
With Fu Ling, for Spleen and Stomach Deficiency with fatigue, a sensation of fullness in the abdomen, dizziness, lethargy, shortness of breath, anorexia and loose stools or diarrhea.
With Bai Zhu, for Spleen Qi Deficiency with anorexia, loose stools and vomiting.
With Dang Gui and Shu Di Huang, for Qi and Blood Deficiency with dizziness, weakness and lassitude.
With Bai Zhu, Zhi Gan Cao, Shu Di Huang and Bai Shao, for Qi and Blood Deficiency.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
With Shu Di Huang and Bai Shao, for Blood Deficiency, often with palpitations.
With Fu Ling and Zhi Gan Cao, for Spleen and Stomach Qi Deficiency.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moderates spasms, alleviates pain, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
With Dang Shen, for anorexia, fatigue and loose stools due to Spleen Deficiency.
With Dang Shen, Fu Ling and Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and augments Qi.
With Bai Shao, moderates spasms and alleviates pain, for painful spasms of the leg or abdomen.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
With Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and resolves Dampness.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine and benefits the marrow.
Warms the Middle Jiao, disperses Cold, dispels Dampness, relieves diarrhea and alleviates pain.
With Fu Ling, for Cold from Deficiency of the Lungs and Kidneys with lower back pain, icy cold feet and wheezing.
Warms the Womb and warms and unblocks the Chong and Ren channels.
With Dang Gui, Shu Di Huang and Bai Zhu, for infertility, irregular uterine bleeding and vaginal discharge due to Cold from Deficiency of the Womb and the Sea of Blood.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold and regulates the menses.
With Bai Shao, regulates and harmonizes Qi and Blood.
With Chuan Xiong, harmonizes, nourishes and invigorates the Blood and disperses Blood Stasis.
With Bai Shao, Shu Di Huang and Chuan Xiong, for menstrual irregularity, amenorrhea, and dysmenorrhea due to Blood Deficiency or Blood Stasis.
With Zhi Gan Cao, moderates spasms and relieves abdominal pain.
Tonifies and stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing and urine and tonifies Yang.
Nourishes the Blood, astringes Yin, regulates menstruation, softens the Liver and relieves pain.
With Dang Gui, nourishes Yin and Blood.
With Dang Gui and Shu Di Huang, for dizziness, blurred vision and dysmenorrhea due to Blood Deficiency or Stasis.
With Gan Cao, for epigastric, hypochondriac or flank pain.
Invigorates the Blood and promotes the movement of Qi.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Deficiency causing menstrual problems including dysmenorrhea, scanty menses and amenorrhea.
Nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin, nourishes Jing and Blood and fills the Marrow.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Deficiency marked by dizziness, palpitations, insomnia and menstrual dysfunction.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens and warms Yang, regulates the Chong and Ren channels, stabilizes the Dai Channel and tonifies and nourishes Qi and Blood.
With Shu Di Huang, for infertility and thin vaginal discharge due to Kidney Deficiency Cold.
Invigorates the Blood, clears Heat and regulates the menses.
Tonifies Kidney Yang
Generates Blood
Tonifies Qi
Nourishes the Chong and Ren channels
Nourishes the uterus
syndromes: Kidney Yang Deficiency with Qi and Blood Deficiency

symptoms: Long term infertility or infertility in an older woman
Possibly a history of late menarche
Delayed menstruation with decreased and pale menses or
Scanty, dark discharge at the end of menstruation
Aches and weakness in the waist and legs
Long-drawn-out urination with a thin stream or dribbling
Pain and coldness in loin and knees
Cold sensation in the lower abdomen
manifestations.pulse: Deep and weak or Thin and soft or Deep and thready or Deep, thready and forceless or Deep and slow

notes: Use this formula 7-10 days before menstruation. After menstruation use Chinese Patent Medicines Ba Zhen Wan and Wu Zi Yan Zong Wan.
